insert into pet_dictionary (ID, Numbers_ID, emblem_ID, Def_Name, Type, Height, Weight, Foundin, is_New, Features, intro, chara, chara_Point, recommend_Quality, recommend_Skill, get_Way, is_Close, change_Tip, superModule) values (#{id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{numbersId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{emblemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{features,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charaPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isClose,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{changeTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supermodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pet_dictionary set Numbers_ID = #{numbersId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, emblem_ID = #{emblemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Def_Name = #{defName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Foundin = #{foundin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_New = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, Features = #{features,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chara = #{chara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chara_Point = #{charaPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend_Quality = #{recommendQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend_Skill = #{recommendSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_Way = #{getWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_Close = #{isClose,jdbcType=TINYINT}, change_Tip = #{changeTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superModule = #{supermodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select ID, Numbers_ID, emblem_ID, Def_Name, Type, Height, Weight, Foundin, is_New, Features, intro, chara, chara_Point, recommend_Quality, recommend_Skill, get_Way, is_Close, change_Tip, superModule from pet_dictionary where ID = #{id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
